author: trawick
msg: Add a test driver for ap_sendfile().

author: trawick
msg: Fix some shell logic in a recent commit which caused APR thread
support to be inadvertently enabled in some Unix configurations

author: trawick
msg: Repair the logic to detect whether we have sendfile support.  After
the previous change, only send_file was supported.

author: dreid
msg: Adjust the extra libraries in hints.m4 to prevent a crash due to library
ordering.  Also add an extra check to configure.in to allow thread
support to be correctly set for BeOS and OS/2.

author: dreid
msg: Tidy up a definition to stop a warning.
